item.title: Do I Have to Tell My New Boyfriend About My Past Infidelity?
item.description: He knows I started seeing someone as my marriage was deteriorating, but I have not admitted the full truth.

item.title: The Scientists Making Antacids for the Sea to Help Counter Global Warming
item.description: The world’s oceans are becoming dangerously acidic. A controversial proposal would raise the pH — by mixing chemicals into the water.

item.title: The Theory That Gives Trump a Blank Check for Aggression
item.description: The true meaning of “flexible realism” — abroad and at home.

item.title: Is It a Good Idea to Wrap Your Christmas Tree?
item.description: A belated ruling on the limits of holiday magic.

item.title: George Saunders Says Ditching These Three Delusions Can Save You
item.description: The celebrated author on the challenges of being kind, the benefits of meditation and the reality check of death.

item.title: Should I Scrub the Evidence That Our Dad Had a Family Before Ours?
item.description: I’m sure it would kill my younger sister if I told her what I found.

item.title: Why on Earth Have I Seen the Same Broadway Show 13 Times? An Investigation.
item.description: As a journalist, I thought I’d never join the ranks of obsessive superfans — until I suddenly became one.

item.title: Forget the Cynics. Here’s Why You Should Get Your Dog a Stroller.
item.description: People might ridicule my choice of pet transportation, but it changed Darla’s life — and made me a better person.

item.title: My Old Friend Might Be Dying. Should I Tell Her I’m Dating Her Ex?
item.description: She’s reached out asking to reconnect. I’ve postponed a meeting, feeling paralyzed.

item.title: Should You Use Dryer Lint as Kindling?
item.description: A ruling on the merits of a thrifty life hack.

item.title: Should I Try to Persuade My Son to Break Off His Engagement?
item.description: My experience tells me that he is making a poor decision and will pay for it.

item.title: The MAGA Plan to Take Over TV Is Just Beginning
item.description: Under Trump, the F.C.C. has used obscure regulatory powers to crack down on network TV. Some conservatives are pushing back.

item.title: Anyone Can Be an Auntie. It’s a State of Mind.
item.description: My Desi family introduced me to the role. Now that I’m an auntie, I understand its full potential.

item.title: ‘This Could End Very Badly’: A Human Rights Lawyer Fears a New Age of Impunity
item.description: Philippe Sands, one of the world’s pre-eminent human rights attorneys, grew up in the shadow of bleak times. He worries that history is taking an unfortunate detour.
